thread.title: Well situated hotel, close to Times Square.

author: Ian S
title: Well situated hotel, close to Times Square.
text:
I was disappointed on arrival simply as the price had increased (Â£200) considerably since booking it on Booking.com, never do that again. The hotel is well situated for tourists, one very good thing is that breakfast is included, a good selection for most people. the staff were friendly and helpful.
Overall the room we stayed in looked quite tired, but generally good all round.
